QuestData.Title: Deconstruction
QuestData.Description: Scouts are reporting a large number of constructs patrolling outside of Dawnseeker Promontory.$b$bIf left unchecked they will pose a considerable threat should the Sunreavers mount an attack.$b$bThe only answer is a preemptive strike. We'll destroy them before they can attack us!
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy 3 Sunreaver Constructs outside of Dawnseeker Promontory.
